segments.text: Of course . I can't live without it , so I always bring my CD with me no matter where I go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of music do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I can't believe this . I am also keen on classic music . And do you know there is a concert of classic music tomorrow evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I didn't get the ticket . And it is said that they were sold out yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got two . We can go there together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Amazing ! I can imagine the feeling when I hear the smooth tune around my ears .
segments.speaker: S2
